dcterms:creator: Narek Tumanyan
Michal Geyer
Shai Bagon
Tali Dekel
dcterms:description: A modified dataset of ImageNet-R specifically tailored for text-driven image-to-image translation, containing 48 images with 3-5 different target prompts for each image, resulting in a total of 212 image-text pairs.
dcterms:title: Modified ImageNet-R-TI2I

dcterms:creator: Gaurav Parmar
Krishna Kumar Singh
Richard Zhang
Yijun Li
Jingwan Lu
Jun-Yan Zhu
dcterms:description: A modified dataset for Zero-Shot image-to-image translation containing images of 4 classes (Cat, Dog, Horse, Zebra) with a total of 60 image-text pairs, including 15 images.
dcterms:title: Modified Zero-Shot I2IT
